ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of <u>intellectual challenge</u> of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the <u>workload</u> of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I got a lot more experience workshopping my scripts in a group and working with other people's suggestions when revising.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: I think having more deadlines/structure could be helpful in encouraging everyone to make progress on their scripts.

This course is workshop-style, which is helpful when people have things to present to the class, however I think that the course can be strengthened in the moment when no one has pages to present to the course. While most everyone in the class has taken other screenwriting classes over the course of their time at Yale, for many of us this is the first time writing a feature-length script and it would be helpful to have more in-depth conversations that cover the basics of story structure before we are expected to write. While much of the learning in this course comes from watching movies that have been made, I believe it would be helpful to have more conversations about character arcs in films and how to go from idea to the page. I think there is an expectation in this class that the students are able and ready to dive headfirst into writing, though I think many of us could have benefitted from some basics before we were meant to be writing pages and pitching full outlines.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I would recommend this course to another student who's serious about screenwriting and wants to write a script for their senior project.
I would recommend this course to a student who is passionate about writing a screenplay and is able to be self-motivated in getting it done.
